title: Deathly Revelations
description: Analisa Still (also known as Analisa Slayter) has just found out who she is, what she is and what she was born to do. To make matters worse, her parents have taken her to a compound for training. When the compound is attacked and the world overrun with vampires (and something else), Ana is forced to team up with the unlikeliest of allies. Thinking her betrothed is dead, Ana soon falls in love with one of her vampire comrades all while vowing to kill the vampires that killed her sister.This book is recommended for ages 19 and up due to language.
author: R.  Holland
